title: IBM Cross-site scripting vulnerability on the Projects page in IBM UrbanCode Build (CVE-2015-1983)
content:
IBM UrbanCode Build is vulnerable to cross-site scripting on the Projects page. CVE(s):   CVE-2015-1983 Affected product(s) and affected version(s): IBM UrbanCode Build 6.1.0, 6.1.0.1. and 6.1.0.2 on all...
from IBM Product Security Incident Response Team http://ift.tt/1VUIc5s
